Looking to add some serious bling to your smile? Encrusted with dazzling stones and made with high-quality materials, these Grillz are perfect for any occasion. From parties to everyday wear, they're sure to turn heads. With their easy-to-use mold and comfortable fit, you can wear them day after day. Order your iced Grillz today and take your style to the next level!

Gold: 18K Bonded(Solid 10K, 14K, 18K Available)

Plating: PVD Vacuum Plated

Stones: Flawless VS Diamond Simulants (Moissanite, Si1-2 & VS1-2 Available on request)

settings.title: Material
settings.content:
18K Gold PVD:

Zotic uses REAL 18K GOLD, that covers with 3 microns of gold,18K gold PVD is the closest thing to soild gold in looks and weight, it beats gold plating by a home run!

Does not tarnish, or fade guaranteed!

Any questions? feel free to contact us

support@zoticnewyork.com

settings.title: Product & Details
settings.content:
This iconic men's necklace boasts the perfect weight and shine for the piece you'll wear day after day. Great for parties, Weddings, Casual meetups and Everyday use! OUR chains are best selling for a reason. Make it the staple in your collection.

FINISH: 18K Gold

Base Metal: Titanium

<style><!--
p {
font-size: 14px;
}
.collapsible {
  font-size: 12px;
  letter-spacing: 2px;
  color: black;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 18px 0px 18px 0px;
  width: 100% !important;;
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(0,0,0,0.15);
  text-align: left;
  outline: none;
  width: 100%;
  font-weight: bold;
text-indent: 7%;
}

.active, .collapsible:hover {

}

.content {
  padding: 0 18px;
  display: none;
  overflow: hidden;
  background-color: #f8faf9;
}
  
.collapsible:after {
  padding-right: 6%;
  content: '\02795'; 
  color: white;
  float: right;
  margin-left: 5px;
}

.active:after {
  content: "\2796"; /* Unicode character for "minus" sign (-) */
padding-right: 6%;
}
--></style>
<script>
var coll = document.getElementsByClassName("collapsible");
var i;

for (i = 0; i < coll.length; i++) {
  coll[i].addEventListener("click", function() {
    this.classList.toggle("active");
    var content = this.nextElementSibling;
    if (content.style.display === "block") {
      content.style.display = "none";
    } else {
      content.style.display = "block";
    }
  });
}
  coll[0].click();


</script>

settings.title: Details & Description
settings.content:
Looking to add some serious bling to your smile? Encrusted with dazzling stones and made with high-quality materials, these Grillz are perfect for any occasion. From parties to everyday wear, they're sure to turn heads. With their easy-to-use mold and comfortable fit, you can wear them day after day. Order your iced Grillz today and take your style to the next level!

Gold: 18K Bonded(Solid 10K, 14K, 18K Available)

Plating: PVD Vacuum Plated

Stones: Flawless VS Diamond Simulants (Moissanite, Si1-2 & VS1-2 Available on request)

settings.title: Chain Size Guide
settings.content:
Moissanite 3mm Tennis Chain 
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication. The Moissanite 3mm Tennis Chain is the perfect complement for a clean outfit. Clasp the diamonds around your neck and watch how your style, formal or casual, transforms effortlessly into a whole new look.

All our products are guaranteed for LIFE - Icemob will replace or repair this item should you experience any defects in craftsmanship or breakage. Learn More

Product Specifications 
Length: 16 in. / 18 in. / 20 in. / 24 in.
Width: 3mm
Thickness: 3mm

 

Note: Moissanite passes almost all hand-held diamond testers, but this is not guaranteed.

settings.title: Shipping & Returns
settings.content:
US Shipping
We offer free 3-6 day shipping for orders over $100, and an express 1-3 day shipping option for $14.95. For international orders, we offer free 7-14 day shipping on orders over $100. See checkout for exact shipping details.

Warranty
Our products are engineered to last. You can be confident knowing your purchase is covered by our lifetime warranty.

30-Day Free Trial
Try it for 30 days, and if you don't absolutely love it for any reason, send it back no questions asked. Returns are 100% free for US orders.

settings.heading: ELEVATE ANY FIT
settings.desc: Zotic isn't just an accessory, it's a statement piece, confidence booster and head turner.

settings.desc: Our quality is unmatched and that’s why we offer you a lifetime warranty covering your piece and offering free replacements.

settings.html:
TRUSTED FOR A REASON

Over 74,221+ Satisfied Customers.

WORN BY LIL TECCA, TYGA, CHRIS OLAVE, FRED WARNER, AND MANY MORE.

REAL GOLD

Our proprietary plating technique powerfully binds real gold to our base metals. ZOTIC gold BONDED, vermeil and solid gold pieces all look and feel the same.

DESIGNED IN Manhattan, NY

Zotic designs, packages and quality checks all of our pieces in New York.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE

Our quality is unmatched and that’s why we offer you a lifetime warranty.
